targets.queryText: SELECT period_start_date || ' → ' || period_end_date AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT period_start_date || ' → ' || period_end_date AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT period_start_date || ' → ' || period_end_date AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT period_start_date || ' → ' || period_end_date AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1;

targets.queryText: WITH recent AS (SELECT period_end_date, mv_delta AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT value FROM recent;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH recent AS (SELECT period_end_date, mv_delta AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT value FROM recent;

targets.queryText: WITH recent AS (SELECT period_end_date, monthly_income_delta AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT value FROM recent;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH recent AS (SELECT period_end_date, monthly_income_delta AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT value FROM recent;

targets.queryText: WITH recent AS (SELECT period_end_date, forward_12m_income_delta AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT value FROM recent;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH recent AS (SELECT period_end_date, forward_12m_income_delta AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT value FROM recent;

targets.queryText: WITH recent AS (SELECT period_end_date, ltv_pct_delta AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT value FROM recent;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH recent AS (SELECT period_end_date, ltv_pct_delta AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT value FROM recent;

targets.queryText: WITH periods AS (SELECT period_start_date, period_end_date FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT h.symbol, h.mv_delta, h.weight_delta, h.income_delta FROM period_holding_changes h JOIN periods p ON h.period_start_date = p.period_start_date AND h.period_end_date = p.period_end_date WHERE h.period_type = 'WEEK' ORDER BY abs(h.mv_delta) DESC LIMIT 10;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH periods AS (SELECT period_start_date, period_end_date FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT h.symbol, h.mv_delta, h.weight_delta, h.income_delta FROM period_holding_changes h JOIN periods p ON h.period_start_date = p.period_start_date AND h.period_end_date = p.period_end_date WHERE h.period_type = 'WEEK' ORDER BY abs(h.mv_delta) DESC LIMIT 10;
